name: cloudily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not clear or definite: In the end, the story turned out to be much less cloudily supernatural than it initially appeared. An air of self-consciousness hung cloudily in the atmosphere.
More examplesFewer examplesThe weeks passed silently, cloudily, like a long, boring afternoon on which nothing ever happens.The main ideas were cloudily true, but the opposing political forces were too strong for them.To some readers, the author seems to write cloudily without making it at all clear what he is speaking about.
